position.description: Serve as the technical lead for the maintenance and administration of Lenoir CC's administrative and support systems.  Responsibilities include making office operation more efficient and effective; planning and implementing technological strategies; develops programs to augment vendor-supplied software; enhance web based services and coordination of application of systems design, analysis and implementation.
